snippet: The Supreme Court has paved the way for an orderly rehabilitation of America’s gravely dysfunctional health care system, the writer says.
abstract: Robert H Frank Economic View column contends the Supreme Court decision to uphold the Affordable Care Act was defended, in places, by deeply flawed economic reasoning, but paves the way for an orderly rehabilitation and an evolution of America’s gravely dysfunctional health care system into something better.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court has paved the way for an orderly rehabilitation of America’s gravely dysfunctional health care system, the writer says.

headline.print_headline: Giving Health Care a Chance to Evolve
headline.seo: Health Care Ruling Lets the System Evolve - Economic View
headline.main: Giving Health Care a Chance to Evolve

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
